description: Enjoy up to 3 hours playback with a built-in battery.Car adaptor, slim remote control, and headphone jack.View JPEG images from picture disc.Free-to-air digital TV channel reception.DVD, DVD+/-R, DVD+/-RW, (S)VCD, CD compatible , MP3-CD, CD and CD-RW playback.Philips Portable TV / DVD Player PET729 7 Inch LCD .
title: Philips PET729/37 7-Inch LCD Portable TV/DVD Player
